fields_of_interest: Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Sport
eu_initiatives: Promoting the health benefits of chiropractic, high standards of education and excellence in conduct and practice. The ECU also represents the interests of the profession at a European level, advocating the inclusion of chiropractic within health policies and health programmes.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: The European Chiropractors' Union (ECU) is established to promote the development of Chiropractic in Europe as a science and a profession by research, teaching, publications and legal activities. It represents the Chiropractic profession in Europe on a supranational level.
relevant_communication: World Spine Day, Straighten Up, Bone and Joint Decade, Just start walking
